text: Pourya Fayazi Damnabi (, born 12 January 1993) is an Iranian volleyball player who plays for Shahrdari Urmia. He also plays for Iran men's national volleyball team. His debut game was against European champions Serbia at the FIVB Volleyball Menâ€™s World Cup on November 22, 2011. ==Honours== ===National team=== *Asian Games **Gold medal (1): 2014 *U23 Asian Championship **Gold medal (1): 2015 ===Club=== *Asian Championship **Gold medal (1): 2014 (Matin) ===Individual=== *Most Valuable Player: 2015 U23 Asian Championship *Best Outside Spiker: 2015 U23 Asian Championship ==Notes== == References == ==Other websites== *FIVB profile Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian sportspeople
title: Pourya Fayazi
